first-freight.name: First Freight CRM
first-freight.description: An email campaign software that could integrate into existing First Freight CRM software
first-freight.purpose: Enable user to create effective email marketing campaign

gemini.name: Gemini
gemini.description: A smart bra that monitors breast tissue, nearby lymphatic and cardiovascular systems for signs of cancer
gemini.users: Women with early stage cancer or higher chance of developing cancer
gemini.process: Material research > hardware design > product design > app design

beta-attack.name: Beta - Attack
beta-attack.description: Check web application vulnerability from standard XSS and SQL injection attack with one click
beta-attack.users: Developers working on small to mid scale applications
beta-attack.purpose: Allow developers to check vulnerability before they deploy
beta-attack.role: Full Stack JavaScript Developer, UX / UI designer
